Method.name: Import
Method.Implementation:
w !,"=== "_..#PClassName_" ===" set mark = ##class(Sti.Data.ENGMark).%New() set mark.Value="Pre-Intermediate" set mark.Code=1 w !, $CASE($$$ISERR(mark.%Save()), 1: "Ошибка! Оценка не создана!",:"Оценка создана")
w !,"=== "_..#PClassName_" ===" set mark = ##class(Sti.Data.ENGMark).%New() set mark.Value="Upper-Elementary" set mark.Code=1 w !, $CASE($$$ISERR(mark.%Save()), 1: "Ошибка! Оценка не создана!",:"Оценка создана")
w !,"=== "_..#PClassName_" ===" set mark = ##class(Sti.Data.ENGMark).%New() set mark.Value="Elementary" set mark.Code=1 w !, $CASE($$$ISERR(mark.%Save()), 1: "Ошибка! Оценка не создана!",:"Оценка создана")
